verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> also spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> unto Joshua לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֛ר <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying תְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> Appoint out לָכֶם֙ אֶת־ <WH853> עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> for you cities הַמִּקְלָ֔ט <WH4733> of refuge אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> of which דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <WH1696> whereof I spake אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH413> to you בְּיַד־ <WH3027> unto you by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> of Moses

לָנ֥וּס <WH5127> may flee שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> there רוֹצֵ֔חַ <WH7523> That the slayer מַכֵּה־ <WH5221> that killeth נֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> [any] person בִּשְׁגָגָ֖ה <WH7684> unawares בִּבְלִי־ <WH1097> without דָ֑עַת <WH1847> [and] unwittingly וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> shall become לָכֶם֙ לְמִקְלָ֔ט <WH4733> thither and they shall be your refuge מִגֹּאֵ֖ל <WH1350> from the avenger הַדָּֽם׃ <WH1818> of blood

וְנָ֞ס <WH5127> And when he that doth flee אֶל־ <WH413> to אַחַ֣ת ׀ <WH259> unto one מֵהֶעָרִ֣ים <WH5892> of those cities הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> of these וְעָמַד֙ <WH5975> shall stand פֶּ֚תַח <WH6607> at the entering שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> of the gate הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city וְדִבֶּ֛ר <WH1696> and shall declare בְּאָזְנֵ֛י <WH241> in the ears זִקְנֵ֥י־ <WH2205> of the elders הָעִֽיר <WH5892> of that city הַהִ֖יא <WH1931> he אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרָ֑יו <WH1697> his cause וְאָסְפ֨וּ <WH622> they shall take אֹת֤וֹ <WH853> הָעִ֙ירָה֙ <WH5892> him into the city אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> to וְנָתְנוּ־ <WH5414> unto them and give ל֥וֹ מָק֖וֹם <WH4725> him a place וְיָשַׁ֥ב <WH3427> that he may dwell עִמָּֽם׃ <WH5973> among

וְכִ֨י <WH3588> now if יִרְדֹּ֜ף <WH7291> pursue גֹּאֵ֤ל <WH1350> And if the avenger הַדָּם֙ <WH1818> of blood אַֽחֲרָ֔יו <WH310> after וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not יַסְגִּ֥רוּ <WH5462> him then they shall not deliver אֶת־ <WH853> הָרֹצֵ֖חַ <WH7523> the slayer בְּיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> up into his hand כִּ֤י <WH3588> because בִבְלִי־ <WH1097> without דַ֙עַת֙ <WH1847> premeditation הִכָּ֣ה <WH5221> because he smote אֶת־ <WH853> רֵעֵ֔הוּ <WH7453> his neighbour וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and did not שֹׂנֵ֥א <WH8130> and hated ה֛וּא <WH1931> he ל֖וֹ מִתְּמ֥וֹל <WH8543> before שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <WH8032> before that time

וְיָשַׁ֣ב ׀ <WH3427> And he shall dwell בָּעִ֣יר <WH5892> in that city הַהִ֗יא <WH1931> he עַד־ <WH5704> until עָמְד֞וֹ <WH5975> until he stand לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> before הָֽעֵדָה֙ <WH5712> the congregation לַמִּשְׁפָּ֔ט <WH4941> for judgment עַד־ <WH5704> until מוֹת֙ <WH4194> [and] until the death הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> priest הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> of the high אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> shall be in those days הָהֵ֑ם <WH1992> those אָ֣ז ׀ <WH227> Then יָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> return הָרוֹצֵ֗חַ <WH7523> then shall the slayer וּבָ֤א <WH935> and come אֶל־ <WH413> to his עִירוֹ֙ <WH5892> unto his own city וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> and unto his own house אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> unto the city אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָ֥ס <WH5127> from whence he fled מִשָּֽׁם׃ <WH8033> they

וַיַּקְדִּ֜שׁוּ <WH6942> And they appointed אֶת־ <WH853> קֶ֤דֶשׁ <WH6943> Kedesh בַּגָּלִיל֙ <WH1551> in Galilee בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> in mount נַפְתָּלִ֔י <WH5321> Naphtali וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁכֶ֖ם <WH7927> and Shechem בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> in mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> Ephraim וְאֶת־ <WH853> קִרְיַ֥ת אַרְבַּ֛ע <WH7153> and Kirjatharba הִ֥יא <WH1931> he חֶבְר֖וֹן <WH2275> which [is] Hebron בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> in the mountain יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וּמֵעֵ֜בֶר <WH5676> And on the other side לְיַרְדֵּ֤ן <WH3383> Jordan יְרִיחוֹ֙ <WH3405> by Jericho מִזְרָ֔חָה <WH4217> eastward נָתְנ֞וּ <WH5414> they assigned אֶת־ <WH853> בֶּ֧צֶר <WH1221> Bezer בַּמִּדְבָּ֛ר <WH4057> in the wilderness בַּמִּישֹׁ֖ר <WH4334> upon the plain מִמַּטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> out of the tribe רְאוּבֵ֑ן <WH7205> of Reuben וְאֶת־ <WH853> רָאמֹ֤ת <WH7216> and Ramoth בַּגִּלְעָד֙ <WH1568> in Gilead מִמַּטֵּה־ <WH4294> out of the tribe גָ֔ד <WH1410> of Gad וְאֶת־ <WH853> [גָּלֹון כ] (גֹּולָ֥ן <WH1474> Golan ק) בַּבָּשָׁ֖ן <WH1316> in Bashan מִמַּטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> out of the tribe מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <WH4519> of Manasseh

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These הָיוּ֩ <WH1961> become עָרֵ֨י <WH5892> These were the cities הַמּֽוּעָדָ֜ה <WH4152> appointed לְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> for all בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> for all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וְלַגֵּר֙ <WH1616> and for the stranger הַגָּ֣ר <WH1481> that sojourneth בְּתוֹכָ֔ם <WH8432> among לָנ֣וּס <WH5127> might flee שָׁ֔מָּה <WH8033> there כָּל־ <WH3605> whoever מַכֵּה־ <WH5221> them that whosoever killeth נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> [any] person בִּשְׁגָגָ֑ה <WH7684> at unawares וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and not יָמ֗וּת <WH4191> thither and not die בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> by the hand גֹּאֵ֣ל <WH1350> of the avenger הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> of blood עַד־ <WH5704> until עָמְד֖וֹ <WH5975> until he stood לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הָעֵדָֽה׃ <WH5712> the congregation פ
